inclusion.criterion: histologically or cytologically confirmed multiple myeloma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: measurable disease present as defined by protein criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: life expectancy of greater than 12 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status =< 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin =< 2 x institutional upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aspartate aminotransferase (AST) =< 3 x institutional upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine =< 1.5 x institutional upper limit of normal OR creatinine clearance >= 60 mL/min/1.73 m^2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ejection fraction by echocardiogram (ECHO) or multi gated acquisition scan (MUGA) >= 40%
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have had chemotherapy or radiotherapy within 4 weeks prior to entering the study
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment history of autologous hematopoietic stem cell transplant (HSCT) or high-dose chemotherapy with stem cell rescue for any medical reason
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients may not be receiving any other investigational agents
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: History of allergic reactions attributed to compounds of similar chemical or biologic composition to or other agents used in the study
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She has received various treatments, including induction chemotherapy, but has not had autologous hematopoietic stem cell transplant (HSCT) or high-dose chemotherapy with stem cell rescue for this disease.
